Product Name: EVOSOFT™ Cabinet Style 32K Grain City Water Softener

AQUALIVIA™ EVOSOFT™ City Water Softener 32000K Cabinet Style.jpg
AQUALIVIA™ EVOSOFT™ City Water Softener 32K Cabinet Style.jpg

Ideal For: One-story homes (with standard water pressure 50–70 PSI)
Key Product Features:
- Compact cabinet-style design – combines high efficiency and modern aesthetics.
- 32,000-grain capacity ideal for small to mid-size households on city water.
- Uses premium Aldex C-800 10% crosslinked resin for longer life and chlorine resistance.
- Reduces hardness minerals that cause scale buildup and soap scum.
- Efficient regeneration system for lower salt and water consumption.
Description: The EVOSOFT™ Cabinet Style 32K is a space-saving, high-performance water softener designed for modern homes on city water. It eliminates hard water problems, protects your plumbing and appliances, and delivers silky-smooth water for your entire household — all in a clean, compact design.
Warranty:
At AQUALIVIA™, we stand behind the quality of our water treatment systems. Every product is carefully built to last, and we’re proud to offer strong warranty coverage to give you peace of mind.
### What’s Covered
- **Mineral Tanks:** 10 years (up to 13" × 54"), 5 years for larger tanks.
- **Control Valves:** 5 years.
- **Brine Tanks:** 5 years.
- **Accessories & Components:** 1 year.
- **AQUAREX™ Whole House Filter:** 5 years.
- **OZONEX™ Ozone Systems:** 1 year.
- **AquaVRay™ UV Systems: **1 year.
- **HydroClear™: **1 year** **(system only)
- **AquaRevive™ RO Systems:** 1 year** **(system only)
### What’s Not Covered
- Regular-use consumables (filters, resins, membranes, UV lamps, cartridges).
- Damage caused by misuse, freezing, flooding, power surges, or improper installation.
- Products used with non-AQUALIVIA™ parts or outside normal water conditions.
### 
### Our Promise
We’ll repair, replace, or provide a comparable solution if your system has a covered defect. Our goal is to make sure your AQUALIVIA™ system works the way it should, so you can enjoy clean, pure water with confidence.
👉 For warranty support, please contact AquaLiviaUSA@gmail.com.
Water Problems Solved:
Hard water and limescale buildup
White spots on faucets, dishes, and shower glass
Dry skin, dull hair, and soap that doesn’t lather
Scale damage in water heaters and appliances
Clogged plumbing from mineral deposits
Low water pressure caused by scale buildup
Rust stains from high iron levels in city water
Blue-green stains from low pH or corrosion
Metallic or salty taste from unconditioned water
High hardness minerals (calcium and magnesium)
Extended Description:
The EVOSOFT™ Cabinet Style 32K brings advanced softening technology to homes that demand performance without bulk. Its compact, all-in-one cabinet design integrates the brine tank and resin tank into a single sleek unit, making it perfect for tight spaces while maintaining full efficiency.
At its core, the system features **Aldex C-800 10% crosslinked resin**, engineered to resist chlorine degradation and provide long-term performance on city water. By removing hardness minerals like calcium and magnesium, it prevents scale buildup that damages plumbing, fixtures, and appliances. The result is softer skin, shinier hair, brighter laundry, and longer-lasting home equipment.
The EVOSOFT™ Cabinet 32K also includes a **smart metered valve** that regenerates only when needed, conserving both salt and water for maximum efficiency. Designed for easy installation and low maintenance, it delivers reliable, professional-grade performance — direct from the factory to your home.
Installation Type: Indoor or Outdoor (Whole-House Point of Entry)
Estimated Installation Time: A professional water softener installation typically takes 2 to 4 hours, but this can vary depending on the complexity of the job and the type of system. Replacing an existing unit might take less time, sometimes as little as an hour, while a new installation with additional plumbing will take longer.

# **AQUALIVIA™ Shipping Policy**
**Effective Date:** 10.17.2025
 **Last Updated:** 10.17.2025
 **Applies to:** All purchases made directly through AQUALIVIA™ or authorized distributors.
## **1. General Overview**
At AQUALIVIA™, we take pride in ensuring your water treatment systems are built, packaged, and shipped with the highest level of care. Because most of our products are made-to-order or assembled at our Florida facility, please allow **an additional 1–2 business days for production and handling** before shipment.
Our factory and fulfillment center operate **Monday through Friday, 8:00 AM to 4:00 PM (Eastern Time)**, excluding weekends and federal holidays. Orders placed outside operating hours will be processed on the next business day.
## **2. Order Processing and Handling Time**
- **Standard Orders:** Processed and shipped within **2–4 business days** after order confirmation.
- 
- **Custom or Special Orders:** May require up to **7–10 business days** for assembly and quality testing prior to shipment.
- 
- **Pre-Orders or Backorders:** Customers will be notified by email with the estimated ship date before payment is processed.
- 
- Orders received **after 12:00 PM EST** are processed the following business day.
- 
Please note: Weekends and holidays are not considered business days.
## **3. Shipping Options and Delivery Times**
We offer a range of shipping options through trusted carriers such as **UPS, FedEx, and USPS**. Estimated transit times apply **after the order has shipped** (not including handling time):
